title: Bronze 2 to Gold 5
body: Last season (S4) i was in silver 4 with a 40% win rate (unfortunately I was bad) and this year after going 4-6 in promos i was placed in Bronze 2. It took me about 70 or so games to go from Bronze 2 in to silver. I skipped a division from Silver 4-> Silver 2 and after the end of the season i managed to crawl into bronze. How many games would it of taken for a normal person? During my time climbing i have also noticed people who are just bad at the game will riot actually ban people who are boosted???????

replies.body:
**I skipped a division from Silver 4-> Silver 2 and after the end of the season i managed to crawl into bronze**

lul wut.
Considering it took me 2 years to go from b2 to g3 yeah that is fast, gj!
